attributes.action: Stop aid to Argentina until they recognise the right of Falkland Islanders to Self Determination.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK Government pay aid to Argentina despite the refusal of the Argentinian Government to recognise the fundamental right of Falkland Islanders to Self Determination.

In recent months, the Argentinian Government has launched effective trade sanctions against the Falklands and the UK.

This petition calls upon the Government to make recognition of the Islanders' right to self determination a precondition of any future aid.
